message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a price of $11,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you acknowledging the value of the product. However,  $11,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time. Would you be willing to come down to $10,000?
I understand your position, Bob.  While I'm confident in the $11,000 valuation, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $10,500?
